amendment.description: To establish a rule of construction regarding travel to and from school.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2234 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2234 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5094-5097l text: CR S5096) To establish a rule of construction regarding travel to and from school.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2234 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2234 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator Lee to Amendment SA 2089.
